name: swiftcart-monorepo
description: SwiftCart E-Commerce Platform - Full Stack Monorepo

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix swiftcart-backend" "npm run dev --prefix swiftcart-frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix swiftcart-backend && npm run build --prefix swiftcart-frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix swiftcart-backend && npm install --prefix swiftcart-frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules swiftcart-backend/node_modules swiftcart-frontend/node_modules swiftcart-backend/dist swiftcart-frontend/dist
